titleStmt.title: SII 7.1042: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 1042. (A.R. No. 409 of 1902). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE VISVANATHA SHRINE IN THE FORT AT ARANTANGI, ARANTANGI TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tribhuvanacakravatti koṉerinmaikoṇṭāṉ muttūṟṟukkūṟṟattup poykainallūṟ tiruccomiśvaramuṭaiya nāyaṉār tevatāṉam ṟku Ivvūr nāṉkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa nilam māḷavaccakravattipakkal tāṅkaḷ peṟṟuṭaiyarāy Ittevaṟku neṟkaṭamaiyāl van=ta nellukku niccayit tiṟu varacceyte yikkoyiṟ tāṉattā riv
vūri loṉpati liraṇṭu pattumāk kāṇi nilan tirucceṉṉelnaṭaippuṟamāyk kārāṇmaiyākac collik kalveṭṭuppaṭi koṭuvantu kāṭṭiṉamaiyil Ippaṭiyālu kum variyilār niccayittapaṭi yāṇṭoṉṟukku Ūrkkālāl nellu Irunūṟṟu nāṟpatiṉ kalamum muṉṟāvatumutal koḷvatāka Ikkoyil tāṉattāṟku na coṉṉom Ivvāṇṭumutal Ippaṭi yi
ṟuttu Ivvū rantarāyamum viṉiyokamum maṟṟum Eppeyarppaṭṭaṉavum taṅkaḷukku maṭappuṟamākak kaikkoṇṭu Ivvāṇṭumutal Ippaṭi yaṉupavikka Ippaṭi candrādityavaT colvatākak kallilum cempilum veṭṭi yāṇṭu 3 nāḷ 3 100 10 5 Ivai neṟkāyanāṭṭu meṉecciyāṉa taraṇiviccātiranallūr cokka ṉuṭaiyanāyakaṉāṉa koṅkarāja ṉeḻuttu Ivai Aṇṭanāṭṭup perumaṇalūr mankiri Irāmaṉāṉa . Itu śrīmāheśvara rakṣai.
Digital edition of SII 7.1042 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
